title: ADG Panorama Tools Professional 5.3.0.43
description: ADG Panorama Tools Professional 5.3.0.43 MultilingualrnrnADG Panorama Tools Professionalrnrn is a panorama stitching software for Internet publishing, printing and interactive viewing. It automatically combines a series of individual photos so seamlessly that they together form impressive 360-degree panorama composition. Just watching the Auto Stitching process is a lot of fun. The program shows in live action how it connects the images by tilting and sliding them a little. This digital panorama is displayed in a web browser and allows the viewer to scroll through the image. No additional plug-ins required. No need to learn digital editing or HTML coding! Just use your digital camera, take several pictures around you, load them to ADG Panorama and let it do the rest. ADG Panorama in seconds automatically aligns, stitches these images together to form the panorama and even creates the web page for you.rnrnBASIC FEATURES* Creates 360-degree panoramasrnrn* Automatically aligns images (Auto-stitching)rnrn* Automatically warps images into true cylindrical viewrnrn* Automatically blends & corrects colors (Auto-blending & color-matching)rnrn* Automatically corrects brightness along panoramic imagernrn* Automatically corrects contrast of panoramic imagernrn* Automatically calculation of optimal output image resolutionrnrn* Automatically lens detectionrnrn* Automated panorama embedding into the web pagernrn* Automatically calling of stitching and Web previewrnrn* Adjustment of panoramic image resolutionrnrn* Adjustment of panoramic image compressonrnrn* Adjustment of images order and rotation.rnrn* Interactive 3D Editor for photos alignment and lens/tilt adjustmentrnrn* Output files format: ADG, QTVR, JPEGrnrn* Source files format: JPEG, TIFF, TARGA, BMP, GIFrnrn* Single panoramic image importrnrn* Input image EXIF format supportrnrn* TWAIN-32 import from scanners and digital camerasrnrn* No restrictions on single size of all input imagesrnrn* Saves projects to work on laterrnrn* Customized user interfacernrn* Output image bilinear filtrationrnrn* Vertical camera movement perspective correctionrnrn* Mouse, wheel and keyboard controlrnrn* Javascript controlrnrn* 3D hardware supportrnrn* Hotspots GUI for Virtual Tur creation (Pro version only)rnrn* Command line stitching in batch files and stand-alone applications (Pro version only) rnrnHomepage -http://www.albatrossdesign.comrnrnADG Panorama Tools Professional 5.3.0.43 Multilingual Thanx NOPE TeamrnrnDownload
